tool_description: Real-Time Handball Live Scores and Video Clip Aggregator. Stay connected with the latest updates in handball, including live scores, odds, and video clips. Dive into game recaps, post-match interviews, and engaging discussions from around the world.
name: Handball Highlights API
title: Handball Highlights API

api_list.name: MatchesController_getMatches
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all matches. At least one parameter has to be specified.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.

api_list.name: HandballBookmakersController_getBookmakerById
api_list.description: Retrieve bookmaker details by bookmaker id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://handball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com/bookmakers/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "handball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://handball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com/bookmakers/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "handball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: HandballBookmakersController_getBookmakers
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all bookmakers based on passed query parameters.

api_list.name: HandballOddsController_getOdds

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.

totalCount.description: Available number of items, relevant to the provided query.

message.description: Explanation message regarding your current tier.

api_list.name: CountriesController_getById
api_list.description: Retrieve country details by country code.

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: A string value code of the country, following the ISO 3166 standard.

api_list.code:
import requests

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "handball-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
